package.description: This package provides an extended sbpl_lattice_planner to perform 3D collision checks against the robot's full kinematic configuration. It should serve as a drop-in replacement as global planner in the navigation stack, to be used with pose_follower_3d as local planner. The 3D collision map is usually sent out from octomap_server.
package.author: Michael Phillips, Armin Hornung
